Of time:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (a) even to, until Ge 8:5 even to the 10th month, Ex Ex 12:6 unto the 14th day, etc., v:Ex 12:15, v:Ex 12:18, etc.; [[עד היום]] unto this day, Ge 19:37, Ge 19:38, [[עד היום הזה]] Ge 26:33, Ge 32:32, both + oft.; [[עד יום]] sq. inf. And sq. another prep., Le 23:16 [[עַד מִמָּחֳרַת הַשַּׁבָּת]], Ne 13:9 [[עַד אַחַר הַשַּׁבָּת]]. With the force of against, Ju Jdg 6:31 [[יוּמַת עַד הַבּׂקֶר]]; cf. (b) end. (b) sq. inf., both of past time, as Ge 8:7, 32:35 [[עַד עֲלוֹת הַשַּׁחַר]], Ge 33:3, Ge 34:5, and esp. future time, as Ge 3:19 [[עַד שׁוּבְְ]] until thy returning, Ge 19:22, Ge 27:45, De 7:20, De 7:23, De 20:20, De 22:2, De 28:20, De 28:22, —both + oft.; cf. definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: During (rare; prop, as far as the limit indicated, including the time previous, cf. e)/wv: so oft. Aram. [[עַד]], 9ad, while), 2Ki 9:22 what is peace [[עַד זְנוּנֵי אִיזֶבֶל]] during, etc.,? Job 20:5 [[עֲדֵי רָָגַע]] during a moment; sq. inf. Ju Jdg 3:26 [[עַד הִתְמַהְמְהָם]] during their delaying, Ex 33:22, Job 7:19 [[עַד בִּלְעִי רֻקִּי]] Jon 4:2.

Of degree, to suggest a higher or the highest; as [[עַד מְאׂד]] even to muchness, i.e. exceedingly (v. [[מְאׂד]]), [[עַד מְהֵרָה]] even to haste † Ps 147:15; Es 5:6 [[וּמַה־בֻּקָּשָׁתֵךְ עַד־חֲחִי הַמַּלְכוּת]] [[וְתֵעָשׂ]], v:Es 5:3; Es 7:2. See also [[עַד לְ]], below. With a neg., to express not even as much as, De 2:5 [[לא אתן]] [[לכם מארחם עַד מִדְרַךְ כַּף רָָגֶל]], and with [[אֶחָד]], † Ex 9:7 [[עַד־אֶחָד]] …[[לאׁ מֵת ]], simil. Ex 14:28, Ju Jdg 4:16, 2Sa 17:22 (rd. [[אֶחָד]] for [[אַחַד]]: v. Dr). Sts. almost = Lat. adeo, 1Sa 2:5 (si vera l.) [[עַד עֲקָרָה ילדה]] [[שׁבעה]] even to the barren, she hath borne seven, i.e. even the barren hath, etc., Job 25:5 [[הן עד־יׇרֵחַ]] [[ולא יאהיל]], Hag 2:19. In comparisons, to the degree of, even like (rare), Na 1:10 [[עַד סִירִים סְבֻכִים]] (text dub.) entangled even like thorns, 1Ch 4:27 [[לא הִרְבּוּ עד בני יהודה]] did not multiply to the degree of (i.e.like), etc. Cf.. 2Sa 23:19 [[עַד הַשְּׁלשָׁה]] [[לאׁ בָא]] did not attain (in prowess) unto the three.

[[אֵין]]), 1Ki 17:17; rarely of future time (the ‘future perfect,’ Dr:§ 17), 2Sa 17:13 (of degree), Ez Eze 34:21 So -[[עַד שֶׁ]] (oft. in NH; v. [[שֶׁ]]) † Ju Jdg 5:7, Ct So 3:4, So 3:4; [[עַד כִּי]] † Ge 26:13 [[עַד כִּי־גׇדַל מְאׂד]], Ge 41:49, 2Sa 23:10, 2Ch 26:15; and (of future time) [[עַד אֲשֶׁר אִם]] † Ge 28:15, Nu 32:17, Is 6:11. (b) with impf., usu. of future time, Ge 27:44 [[עַד אֲשֶׁר תָּשׁוּב חֲמַר אָחִיְ]], Ge 29:8, Ex 23:30, Ex 24:14, Le 22:4, Nu 11:20, Nu 20:17, 1Sa 22:3, Ho 5:15 +; rarely of past time, Jon 4:5 [[עד אשׁר יראה]] till he should see, Ec 2:3. So (of the future) -[[עַד שֶׁ]] † Ct So 2:7, So 2:17, So 3:5, So 4:6, So 8:4, Ps 123:2; and [[עַד כִּי]] † Ge 49:10 [[עַד כִּי־יׇבאׁ שִׁילֽה]].

While (rare: cf. 12 b):—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: with pf., 1Sa 14:19 [[עד דִּבֶּר שׁאול]] while Saul spake.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with impf., Ps 141:10 [[יַחד אָנׁכִי עַד אֶעֱבׂר]] while I at the same time pass by.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: with ptcp., Job 1:18 [[עַד זֶה מְדַבֵּר]] (but rd. prob. [[עׂד]], as v:Job 1:16, v:Job 1:17), Ne 7:3.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: -[[עַד שֶׁ]] (without vb.) † Ct So 1:12. So [[עַד לאׁ]] while not = ere yet (of past time) † Pr 8:26 [[עד לא עשׂה אדץ]] (so [[עַד לָא]], lo0 9ad, oft., e.g. Ge 24:15 Targum, Mt 1:18); and [[עד אשׁר לא]] (of the fut.) † Ec 12:1, Ec 12:2, Ec 12:6 (cf. Talm. [[עַד דְּלָא]], Mishn. [[שֶׁלּאׁ עַד]]).

Of degree, to the point that, so that even  (rare), Is 47:7 Thou saidst, I shall be for ever a lady, [[עַד לאׁ שַׂמְתְּ אֵלֶּה עַל לִבֵךְ]] to the point that (going so far in thy pride that) thou didst not, etc. (but Hi Che Du al. join [[גְּבֶרֶת עַד]] I shall be for ever, a lady perpetually; v. 1. [[עַד]]); Job 14:6 (Di De Bu Du ) to the point that he may enjoy, etc., Is 22:14 (Du). In Jos 17:14 [[עַד אֲשֶׁר]] ´[[עַד כּׂה בֵּֽרְכַנִי י]], rd. [[עַל אֲשֶׁר]] because that (Ges Buhl; cf. Di).

definitions.title: III.
definitions.body: [[עַד לְ]], a strengthened form for [[עַד]], found chiefly in Ch Ezr, and occurring in most of the above senses. Thus

Of time: [[עד לעולם]] 1Ch 23:25, 1Ch 28:7; [[לְמֵרָחוֹק עַד]] 2Ch 26:15, Ezr 3:13; Ezr 9:4 [[עד למנחת הערב]]; [[עַד לַדָּבָר הַזֶּה]] Ezr 10:14 prob. during (Keil: Ges Be with regard to, strengthened for [[לְ]]); sq. inf. [[עַד לַעֲלוֹת הַמִּנְחָה]] 1Ki 18:29; [[עַד לִכְלוֹת]] 1Ch 28:20, 2Ch 29:28; [[עַד לְכַלֵּה]] 2Ch 24:10, 2Ch 31:1; [[עד להשׁחית]] 2Ch 26:16; [[עַד לָמוּת]] 2Ch 32:24 (‖ 2Ki 20:1 [[לָמוּת]] alone); Ezr 10:14 [[עד להשׁיב]].

Of degree: [[עַד לְמַחֲנֶה גׇדוֹל]] even unto (till there was) a great camp, 1Ch 12:23; [[עַד לְמַ֫עְלָה]] = exceedingly 2Ch 16:12, 2Ch 17:12, 2Ch 26:8; [[עַד לִמְאׂד]] 2Ch 16:14; [[עַד לְשִׂמְחָה]] 2Ch 29:30 [[עַד לָרׂב]] 31:30; [[עַד לְאֵין]] [[מַרְפֵּא]] 2Ch 36:16.
